description: three small vignettes connected by scrolling leafy vines; top vignette is image of double portrait in high relief sculpture of two men with full beards; central image is doorway, window and stairs with heavy foliage at top; bottom image is a small house with several figures on street at left
marks: Signature and Edition LLC, in the print: [A. Lepère (illegible)]; LRC, i
title: La Maison de Millet à Barbizon
